Class Cvc

java.lang.Object

public class Cvc extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ADD_CVC_STEP1
    One out of 2 steps insert process A query responsible for INSERTING a new coupon purchased record ONLY if there are enough in the stock
    static final String
    ADD_CVC_STEP2
    TWO out of 2 steps insert process A query responsible for UPDATING the Amount colum to its value minus one This query will run only if step 1 will work
    static final String
    CREATE_TABLE_CVC
    A Query responsible for creating the customers_vs_coupons table when initializing the project
    static final String
    DELETE_CVC
    A query responsible for DELETING one purchased by record from the database (does not increment the value of the current stock [Amount] of the coupon)
    static final String
    GET_ALL_COUPON_OF_CUSTOMER
    A query responsible for RETURNING all the purchased coupon of a customer >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> aliases cvc stands for customer_vs_coupon coup stands for coupon >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
    static final String
    GET_ALL_COUPON_OF_CUSTOMER_BY_CATEGORY
    A query responsible for RETURNING all the purchased coupon of a customer by category >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> aliases cvc stands for customer_vs_coupon coup stands for coupon >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
    static final String
    GET_ALL_COUPON_OF_CUSTOMER_UP_TO_PRICE
    A query responsible for RETURNING all the purchased coupon of a customer by up to price >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> aliases cvc stands for customer_vs_coupon coup stands for coupon >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
    static final String
    VALIDATE_OUT_OF_STOCK
    Exception checker A query responsible for CHECKING if coupon is out of stock (Amount = 0) This query will run only if step 1 will fail
